00017 namespace ldmx {
00018 
00019     const float HcalDigiProducer::FIRST_LAYER_ZPOS = 569.5;
00020     const float HcalDigiProducer::LAYER_ZWIDTH = 60.;
00021     const int HcalDigiProducer::NUM_HCAL_LAYERS = 15;
00022     const float HcalDigiProducer::MEV_PER_MIP = 1.40;
00023     const float HcalDigiProducer::PE_PER_MIP = 13.5 * 6. / 4.;
00024 
00025     HcalDigiProducer::HcalDigiProducer(const std::string& name, Process& process) :
00026             Producer(name, process) {
00027         hits_ = new TClonesArray(EventConstants::HCAL_HIT.c_str());
00028     }
00029 
00030     void HcalDigiProducer::configure(const ParameterSet& ps) {
00031         detID_ = new DefaultDetectorID();
00032         random_ = new TRandom(ps.getInteger("randomSeed", 1000));
00033         meanNoise_ = ps.getDouble("meanNoise");
00034     }
00035 
00036     void HcalDigiProducer::produce(Event& event) {
00037 
00038         std::map<int, int> hcalLayerNum, hcalLayerPEs, hcalDetId;
00039         std::map<int, float> hcalZpos;
00040         std::map<int, float> hcalLayerEdep, hcalLayerTime;
00041 
00042         // looper over sim hits and aggregate energy depositions for each detID
00043         TClonesArray* hcalHits = (TClonesArray*) event.getCollection(EventConstants::HCAL_SIM_HITS, "sim");
00044 
00045         int numHCalSimHits = hcalHits->GetEntries();
00046         for (int iHit = 0; iHit < numHCalSimHits; iHit++) {
00047             SimCalorimeterHit* simHit = (SimCalorimeterHit*) hcalHits->At(iHit);
00048             //int detID=simHit->getID();
00049             int detIDraw = simHit->getID();
00050             if (verbose_)
00051                 std::cout << "detIDraw: " << detIDraw << std::endl;
00052             detID_->setRawValue(detIDraw);
00053             detID_->unpack();
00054             int layer = detID_->getFieldValue("layer");
00055             if (verbose_)
00056                 std::cout << "layer: " << layer << std::endl;
00057             if (hcalLayerEdep.find(simHit->getID()) == hcalLayerEdep.end()) {
00058                 // first hit, initialize
00059                 hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw] = simHit->getEdep();
00060                 hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] = simHit->getTime() * simHit->getEdep();
00061                 hcalDetId[detIDraw] = detIDraw;
00062                 hcalZpos[detIDraw] = simHit->getPosition()[2];
00063                 hcalLayerNum[detIDraw] = layer;
00064             } else {
00065                 // not first hit, aggregate
00066                 hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw] += simHit->getEdep();
00067                 hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] += simHit->getTime() * simHit->getEdep();
00068             }
00069         } // end loop over sim hits
00070 
00071         // loop over detID (layers) and simulate number of PEs
00072         int ihit = 0;
00073         for (std::map<int, float>::iterator it = hcalLayerEdep.begin(); it != hcalLayerEdep.end(); ++it) {
00074             int detIDraw = it->first;
00075             double depEnergy = hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw];
00076             hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] = hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] / hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw];
00077             double meanPE = depEnergy / MEV_PER_MIP * PE_PER_MIP;
00078 
00079             //        std::default_random_engine generator;
00080             //std::poisson_distribution<int> distribution(meanPE);
00081 
00082             hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] = random_->Poisson(meanPE);
00083             hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] += random_->Gaus(meanNoise_);
00084 
00085             if (verbose_) {
00086                 std::cout << "detID: " << detIDraw << std::endl;
00087                 std::cout << "Layer: " << hcalLayerNum[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00088                 std::cout << "Edep: " << hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00089                 std::cout << "numPEs: " << hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00090                 std::cout << "time: " << hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00091                 std::cout << "z: " << hcalZpos[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00092             }        // end verbose
00093 
00094             int layer = hcalLayerNum[detIDraw];
00095             double energy = hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] / PE_PER_MIP * MEV_PER_MIP; // need to add in a weighting factor eventually
00096 
00097             HcalHit *hit = (HcalHit*) (hits_->ConstructedAt(ihit));
00098 
00099             //  hit->setLayer(layer);
00100             hit->setPE(hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw]);
00101             hit->setAmplitude(hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw]);
00102             hit->setEnergy(energy);
00103             hit->setTime(hcalLayerTime[detIDraw]);
00104             hit->setID(detIDraw);
00105             //  hit->setZpos(hcalZpos[detIDraw]);
00106             ihit++;
00107         } // end loop over detIDs (layers)
00108         // put it into the event
00109         event.add("hcalDigis", hits_);
00110     }
00111 
00112 }
